title: Data Structures
description: Practice implementing fundamental data structures and understanding their operations and use cases.

challenges.title: Linked List
challenges.description: Implement a singly linked list with basic operations: insert, delete, search, and reverse.

challenges.title: Binary Tree
challenges.description: Implement a binary tree with basic operations: insert, search, and traversal methods.

challenges.title: Graph
challenges.description: Implement a graph data structure with basic operations: add vertex, add edge, and traversal methods.

challenges.title: Hash Table
challenges.description: Implement a hash table with basic operations: put, get, remove, and collision handling.

challenges.title: Stack & Queue
challenges.description: Compare and implement both stack and queue data structures, understanding their differences.
